ygData.subject: Re: Speed-up exp
ygData.msgSnippet: As a wood elf ranger at level 6 I tore through enough bandits (close to BB and Felwithe)last night to quickly move up to level 7.  It was a little slow (5
ygData.messageBody:
As a wood elf ranger at level 6 I tore through enough bandits (close to BB
and Felwithe)last night to quickly move up to level 7. It was a little slow
(5 hours?) but I had 3-4 others grouped with me and most of them were level
7. Only once was there a feeling of panic when two 8th level bandits took
turns banging on my skull and the cleric was off getting something to eat
from the fridge.



----- Original Message -----
From: john dvorak <jcdvorak@...>
To: <EQCheats@onelist.com>
Sent: Monday, April 12, 1999 11:41 PM
Subject: [EQCheats] Speed-up exp


> From: "john dvorak" <jcdvorak@...>
>
> What can a ranger start killing at level 6, that I can kill, or kill in a
> series to get to 9-10
>
>
